Headline: #91 Austin Temporary Southbound Reroute near Austin/Fillmore
ShortDescription: Southbound 91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, Railroad, Mason, Roosevelt and Austin: due to, street blockage near Austin/Fillmore

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, Railroad, Mason, Roosevelt and Austin: due to, street blockage near Austin/Fillmore.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
